title: Mars Transit in the 11th House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits the 11th house for Capricorn Ascendant, ambition focuses on gains, networks, and long-term objectives. You feel driven to push goals aggressively, expand influence, and take leadership within groups or organizations. Earnings can rise through decisive action and competitive efforts, but conflicts with friends or teammates may occur if dominance increases. This phase rewards strategic initiative and disciplined teamwork. Sustainable success comes by aligning personal drive with collective purpose and managing aggression through cooperation.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Strong desire for achievement and gains
Risk of forceful behavior in groups

closing: This Mars transit energizes Capricorn Ascendants to achieve gains through action. Cooperation turns ambition into lasting success.
